name: The UK Cards Association
goal: The UK Cards Association is the trade body for the card payments industry in the UK. Our membership includes all major credit, debit and charge card issuers, and card payment acquirers (that enable businesses to accept card payments). The Association provides a clear and cohesive industry voice to the outside world; develops industry standards and best practice; safeguards the integrity of card payments by tackling card fraud; and co-ordinates other industry-wide initiatives relating to card payments and the provision of credit.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Home Affairs, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Banking and payments; data; financial fraud
